name: Avoid The Pit
description:
Ultimate addictive and incredible game with amazing graphics and simple game play.
Challenging and hard to master game with different characters to play with. Just avoid the pits in your way by jumping over them. If single pit comes in the way of your unlocked character single tap would be enough to avoid it. While moving on your track if your character face to missing tiles double tap with some interval and avoid the pit. You can unlock cool characters like Dog, Cat, Goat, Bull, Monkey, Unicorn in the game. Play with your character and compete with your friends by sharing your score.

Beware, don’t let your in-game character fall in the pit. If you missed to tap on right time you won't be able to move on.

Lets see how long can you last?
